dos_format.message: PBS file is DOS file format

mac_format.message: PBS file is Mac file format

misplaced_shebang.message: shebang line should be the first line, this is ignored
misplaced_shebang.remedy: move line to the top of the file, or remove

missing_shebang.message: missing shebang, it should be the first line of the script
missing_shebang.remedy: add a shebang line at the top of the file, i.e., '#!/bin/bash -l'

malformed_pbs_dir.remedy: directive should have the form '#PBS <option> <value>', see qsub man page for more information

misplace_pbs_dir.message: PBS directive should be at the file, just below the shebang, this is ignored
misplace_pbs_dir.remedy: move line to its intended location, or remove it

no_script.remedy: add some work to the job

invalid_join.message: value '{val}' is invalid for the -j join option
invalid_join.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

invalid_mail_event.message: value '{val}' is invalid for the -m mail event option
invalid_mail_event.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

invalid_name.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

ppn_no_number.remedy: ppn (processes per node) should be a positive integer

gpus_no_number.remedy: gpus (GPUs per node) should be a positive integer

invalid_mem_format.message: '{size}' is not a valid memory specification
invalid_mem_format.remedy: memory is specified as a number, with units kb, mb, gb, or tb

invalid_pmem_format.message: '{size}' is not a valid process memory specification
invalid_pmem_format.remedy: process memory is specified as a number, with units kb, mb, gb, or tb
